description: black and white image of building with stairs at L leading to upper door; curved, low hung roof at R; in plastic slip cover
image_copyright: Copyright of the artist%2C artist%27s estate%2C or assignees
inscription:
Signature, Title, Inscription, Stamp and Label

See signed
markings: on mount verso, stamped in black: 649; on mount verso, two stamps and labels: Smithsonian Stamp and Artist’s stamp; Boston Camera Club label; half torn-off label
signed: below image at R, in pencil; [Arthur Hammond]; below image at L, in pencil: [Sun on the Roof]; on mount verso, in pencil: [Sun on the Roof (underscored two times)/ Member of Boston Camera Club Since 1910.)/ 3055/13]; on mount verso, written in red colored pencil: [154 (in box)]
title: Sun on the Roof
